definition: Austria/Austrian/abbr. for 奧地利|奥地利[Ao4 di4 li4]/Olympic/Olympics/abbr. for 奧林匹克|奥林匹克[Ao4 lin2 pi3 ke4]
Slovakia/Slovak/abbr. for 斯洛伐克[Si1 luo4 fa2 ke4]
to block/to be stuck/to be wedged/customs station/a clip/a fastener/a checkpost/Taiwan pr. [ka3]
to stop/to block/(computing) (coll.) slow/(loanword) card/CL:張|张[zhang1],片[pian4]/truck (from "car")/calorie (abbr. for 卡路里[ka3 lu4 li3])/cassette

pinyin: Ao4 si1 ka3 jin1 xiang4 jiang3

sentences.english: Of the 35 highest-paid actors in 2010, 17 have won Academy Awards.
sentences.chinese: 在35位片酬最高的演员中，有17位拿过奥斯卡奖。

sentences.english: Nominated for Oscar Best Foreign Language Film in 1998.
sentences.chinese: 本片荣获1998年奥斯卡最佳外语片提名。

sentences.english: This is her first Oscar nomination.
sentences.chinese: 这是她的首次奥斯卡提名。

sentences.english: A lot of my favorite images are of the over-sized Oscar statues.
sentences.chinese: 我所喜爱的相片里有不少是大码的奥斯卡雕像。

sentences.english: There are five nominees in most Oscar categories.
sentences.chinese: 奥斯卡的大多数奖项都有五位被提名者。

sentences.english: Taylor however had already won two Oscars.
sentences.chinese: 泰勒却已经得过两次奥斯卡奖。

sentences.english: Jackman reportedly requested to have Luhrmann stage the Oscar number.
sentences.chinese: 据称杰克曼竭力邀请鲁尔曼执导奥斯卡舞台。

sentences.english: A children’s science fiction movie, the ET won the Academy Award in 1982.
sentences.chinese: 一部儿童科幻电影，赢得过1982年的奥斯卡奖。

sentences.english: Don't take on an illness that requires an Oscar-worthy performance.
sentences.chinese: 别选一个需要奥斯卡级别演技的病。

sentences.english: Both of Oscar's hind legs were accidentally chopped off in a combine harvester.
sentences.chinese: 奥斯卡的两只后腿不小心被一台联合收割机截断。

sentences.english: First, the Oscar is plated with copper to prevent corrosion.
sentences.chinese: 首先，奥斯卡镀上铜以防止腐蚀。

sentences.english: Side by the Academy Award for Best Female sweep starring Renee Zellweger.
sentences.chinese: 由奥斯卡最佳女扫边芮妮齐薇格主演。

sentences.english: We are near the Oskarshamn nuclear power station in south-east Sweden.
sentences.chinese: 我们现在在瑞典东南部的奥斯卡港核电站附近。

sentences.english: Collectively, they have a combined 69 nominations and 15 wins, pending the outcome of the Feb. 22 ceremony, which sees Pitt, Jolie and Streep up for honors.
sentences.chinese: 他们总共活得69项奥斯卡提名并赢得其中的15项。

sentences.english: King's Speech'"gets royal treatment at Oscars."
sentences.chinese: 奥斯卡提名揭晓，英国影片《国王的演讲》先声夺人。

sentences.english: Many movie stars participated in the Oscara-warding ceremony tonight.
sentences.chinese: 很多电影明星参加了今晚的奥斯卡颁奖典礼。

pinyin: Ao4 si1 ka3 jin1 xiang4 jiang3

definition: Golden Bear, award at the Berlin International Film Festival
Alan, Allen, Allan, Alain etc (name)/A-lan (Chinese female name)
Golden Horse Film Festival and Awards
prefix used before monosyllabic names, kinship terms etc to indicate familiarity/used in transliteration/also pr. [a4]
abbr. for Afghanistan 阿富汗[A1 fu4 han4]
